githubProxy.title: GitHub Proxy Address
githubProxy.subtitle: Set the GitHub proxy address used when downloading plugins or updating AstrBot. This is effective in mainland China's network environment. Can be customized, input takes effect in real time. All addresses do not guarantee stability. If errors occur when updating plugins/projects, please first check if the proxy address is working properly.
githubProxy.label: Select GitHub Proxy Address

migration.title: Data Migration to v4.0.0
migration.subtitle: If you encounter data compatibility issues, you can manually start the database migration assistant

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.subtitle: Export or import all AstrBot data for easy migration to a new server

customize.title: Customize Sidebar
customize.subtitle: Drag to reorder modules, or move modules in/out of the "More Features" group. Settings are saved locally in your browser.

export.title: Create Backup
export.description: Export all data as a ZIP backup file, including database, knowledge base, config and attachments.
export.includes: Backup includes: Main database, Knowledge bases (metadata + vector index + documents), Config files, Attachment files

import.title: Import Backup
import.warning: ⚠️ Import will clear and overwrite existing data! Please make sure you have backed up your current data.
import.restartRequired: Data has been successfully imported. It is recommended to restart AstrBot immediately for all changes to take effect.

version.matchMessage:
Import will clear and overwrite all existing data, including:
• Main database (conversations, settings, etc.)
• Knowledge bases
• Plugins and plugin data
• Configuration files

This action cannot be undone! Do you want to continue?
version.minorDiffMessage:
Minor version differences are usually compatible, but there may be some data structure changes.
Import will clear and overwrite all existing data!

Do you want to continue?
version.majorDiffMessage:
Major version numbers are different. Cross-major-version import may cause data corruption.
Please use the same major version of AstrBot for import.

list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this backup file? This action cannot be undone.
list.renameHint: Filename can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens and dots
list.ftpHint: For large backup files, you can also upload directly to the data/backups directory via FTP/SFTP
